SEARCH
Package org.bukkit.inventory.meta.trim

Interface TrimMaterial

All Superinterfaces:
Keyed, Keyed, Translatable
public interface TrimMaterial extends Keyed, Translatable
Represents a material that may be used in an ArmorTrim.

      @Deprecated(forRemoval=true, since="1.20.4") @NotNull NamespacedKey getKey()
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      use Registry.getKey(Keyed), RegistryAccess.getRegistry(io.papermc.paper.registry.RegistryKey), and RegistryKey.TRIM_MATERIAL. TrimMaterials can exist without a key.
